items.summary: Add a public (no sign-in required) About/Onboarding section that explains what the DM Networks project is, how users can interact (sign in with Internet Identity, create/edit profile, post messages in the live chat), and clearly states that the project is managed by DMC Technologies with a clickable link to https://www.dmc-technologies.fr.
Update the global layout to surface DMC Technologies attribution consistently (e.g., in the footer) while preserving existing branding links already present in the app.
